1.comment: DeShaun Foster, rushed for 76 yards on 18 carries. He also had 5 catches for 25 more yards. That's not bad, but Foster obviously isn't even close to as talented as Gore. 2.comment: DeShaun Foster, playing for the injured Frank Gore, rushed for 36 yards on 12 carries. He also caught 2 passes, disappointing all the fantasy players who inserted him into their lineup.
